other_tests.findings: Heterozygous deletion of a cytosine (C) in the third exon, affecting nucleotide 825 (825delC).

other_tests.date: Ages 5, 8, and 11 for Case 1; Age 4 for Case 2
other_tests.findings: Case 1: Poor motor skills; slight decline in verbal scale and manipulative skills within normal range. Case 2: Loss of balance, tremor, hyperreflexia, and mental retardation below normal range.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Case 1 shows slight decline over the years; Case 2 shows marked decline in various skills.

other_tests.date: At age 7 for Case 1; At age 4 for Case 2
